channel.title: linux on 楚大洋 Wilfred Githuka
channel.description: Recent content in linux on 楚大洋 Wilfred Githuka

item.title: What Is It Like To Use Linux In A Chinese Environment
item.description: This is one of those posts I write in a Java Coffee house sipping an expensive cup of tea and wondering why am paying so expensive for milk+tea, but anyway its Java, its expensive because its Java, and the environment is awesome. So I work at a really great Chinese company called AVIC International, Nairobi. My workmates both Kenyan and Chinese are the best I have met so far in my career, they are quite an undertanding group of lads.

item.title: Chinese Fonts on a Linux System
item.description: An instruction manual on how to install Chinese fonts on a linux machine. The process is preety straight-forward except for some small things.
